# TOUCH SCREEN MODE Choose the shooting operations performed using touch controls. | Mode | Description | |--------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | !AF Icon AF | - In focus mode S (AF-S), the camera focuses when you tap your subject in the display. Focus locks at the current distance until you tap the AF OFF icon.
- In focus mode C (AF-C), the camera initiates focus when you tap your subject display. The camera will continue to adjust focus for changes in the distance to the subject until you tap the AF OFF icon.
- In manual focus mode (MF), you can tap the display to focus on the selected subject using autofocus. | | !AF OFF Icon AF OFF | | | !AREA Icon AREA | Tap to select a point for focus or zoom. The focus frame will move to the selected point. | | !OFF Icon OFF | Touch screen mode off. | - The behavior of the touch screen varies with the AF mode. - To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indicator, select OFF for **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING**.
